channel.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
channel.description:
So I'm stuck at this part in BMS. I believe this is Surface Tension? But I don't remember tbh. I also believe that this may be part of ST Uncut. Either way, when I get to this guard... nothing happens.
The fact that I kill him and get the 'Evaluation: Terminated" screen leads me to believe that he's a needed NPC to advance... So I'm not sure what to do. Any advice would be appreciated.
Thank you all.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hUX5YyPuinQ[/url]

item.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
Thanks guys! That fixed the issue! However, doing so caused a weird, different issue. Now, every time I reload, every gun automatically fires one shot…

It’s kind of a Buzz kill…

Read full topic
item.source: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension

item.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
BuzzKillington:

The Black Mesa Animation Revamp mod, and the Glock --> Beretta mod. That’s it. You think that could be causing my issues?

They shouldn’t be causing any issues.

I recommend you redownload Surface Tension Uncut and put it in your BMS folder. That should fix your issue with the scene not working.

Read full topic
item.source: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension

item.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
PCGameCrazy:

I have one quick question: Besides Surface Tension Uncut, what other mods do you have installed?

The Black Mesa Animation Revamp mod, and the Glock --> Beretta mod. That’s it. You think that could be causing my issues?

Read full topic

item.source: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension

item.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: Faceless_HECU_Marine
item.description:
Redownload STUncut and copy the “scenes” folder, and make it overwrite your current scenes folder in the BMS folder.

Read full topic
item.source: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension

item.title: Guard scripted sequence won't play. Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: BuzzKillington
item.description:
Bump. Anyone, have any ideas? I’d really rather not load the map over and use impulse 101.

Is there, perhaps a console command to get the guard to execute the sequence?

Read full topic
